message: I propose a fair split, taking into account our roles in this game. Let's start with 90/10, but I'm open to negotiation.

Alice, your offer is heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I propose a 60/40 split in my favor recognizing my risk in rejecting your first offer and the impact of inflation as time passes.

Bob, your last offer was too far off from my expectations. I'm willing to compromise, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is still fair considering the risks of further inflation. Let's work together and reach a solution that benefits both of us.
